death.attack.anvil: %1$s found out that heavy metal going at 121 mph hurts. A lot.
death.attack.anvil.player: %1$s was team-killed by %2$s using heavy metal.
death.attack.cactus: %1$s managed to die by a cactus. Please mock them for me.
death.attack.cactus.player: %1$s managed to die to a cactus. %2$s, please mock them for me.
death.attack.dragonBreath: %1$s suffocated in Ender Dragon Bath Water.
death.attack.dragonBreath.player: %1$s was waterboarded in Ender Dragon Bath Water by %2$s.
death.attack.explosion.player.item: %1$s smashed hydrogen atoms together with %2$s using %3$s.
death.attack.fall: %1$s has fallen and can't get up.
death.attack.fallingBlock: %1$s was done in by Minecraft's physics engine.
death.attack.fallingStalactite.player: %1$s was split in two by %2$s... that sounded weird. Oh well.
death.attack.fireball.item: %1$s was nuked from above by %2$s using %3$s.
death.attack.fireworks: %1$s celebrated the 4th of July a little too hard.
death.attack.flyIntoWall: %1$s forgot to turn on no-clip and ran face-first into a wall.
death.attack.flyIntoWall.player: %1$s didn't want to turn on no-clip in front of %2$s.
death.attack.freeze: %1$s was cool (for the first time in their life).
death.attack.freeze.player: %1$s was cool in front of %2$s and regretted it immediately.
death.attack.generic.player: %1$s's heart stopped. The only eyewitness was %2$s.
death.attack.hotFloor: %1$s walked on a hot beach without shoes, then had a fucking heart attack idk.
death.attack.hotFloor.player: %1$s walked on a hot beach without shoes, then got fucking shot by %2$s idk.
death.attack.inFire.player: %1$s embraced their inner marshmallow with encouragement from %2$s.
death.attack.inWall: %1$s realized breathing in solids isn't a great idea for long-term survival.
death.attack.inWall.player: %1$s anti-breathed and died. %2$s was also there.
death.attack.lava: %1$s wished lava was a cooler guy.
death.attack.lava.player: %1$s pulled a Terminator 2 in front of %2$s.
death.attack.lightningBolt.player: %1$s pissed off %2$s, who was secretly Zeus this whole time.
death.attack.magic.player: %1$s overdosed, and %2$s watched them drown in their own vomit.
death.attack.message_too_long: This one was so brutal, I had to cut it down for the children in the audience: %s
death.attack.onFire: %1$s didn't start the fire... or stop it, for that matter.
death.attack.onFire.item: %1$s didn't start the fire. %2$s with %3$s did though.
death.attack.onFire.player: %1$s didn't start the fire. %2$s did though.
death.attack.outsideBorder.player: %1$s entered the world between worlds, leaving %2$s traumatized.
death.attack.outOfWorld: %1$s journeyed to the center of the Earth. They have yet to return.
death.attack.outOfWorld.player: %1$s committed suicide, and it's all thanks to %2$s.
death.attack.sonic_boom.item: %1$s fucked around and found out about %2$s wielding %3$s.
death.attack.sonic_boom.player: %1$s fucked around and found out about %2$s.
death.attack.stalagmite.player: %1$s was spit-roasted by %2$s... that sounded weird. Oh well.
death.attack.starve: %1$s joined the rains down in Africa.
death.attack.starve.player: %1$s joined the rains down in Africa with %2$s.
death.attack.sting: %1$s accidentally hit a bee and regretted it immediately.
death.attack.sting.item: %1$s accidentally hit a bee and regretted it immediately %2$s using %3$s.
death.attack.sting.player: %1$s accidentally hit a bee and regretted it immediately by %2$s.
death.attack.sweetBerryBush: %1$s didn't watch where they were going in a taiga.
death.attack.sweetBerryBush.player: %1$s didn't watch where they were going in a taiga. %2$s was also there.
death.attack.thorns: %1$s realized their actions have consequences thanks to %2$s.
death.attack.thorns.item: %1$s realized their actions have consequences thanks to %3$s and %2$s.
death.attack.thrown: %1$s was battered and hung out to dry by %2$s.
death.attack.thrown.item: %1$s was battered and hung out to dry by %2$s using %3$s.
death.attack.wither: %1$s ceased. That's it, nothing funny. They just died.
death.attack.witherSkull: (insert Sans Undertale joke involving %1$s and %2$s here).
death.attack.witherSkull.item: (insert Sans Undertale joke involving %1$s and %2$s using %3$s here).
death.fell.accident.ladder: %1$s ignored the warning label and stood on the top step of the ladder.
death.fell.accident.other_climbable: %1$s ignored the warning label and stood on the top step of the ladder.
death.fell.accident.scaffolding: %1$s realized that construction was not the career path for them.
death.fell.accident.twisting_vines: %1$s thought they were Tarzan. %1$s thought wrong.
death.fell.accident.vines: %1$s thought they were Tarzan. %1$s thought wrong.
death.fell.accident.weeping_vines: %1$s thought they were Tarzan. %1$s thought wrong.
death.fell.assist: %1$s's destiny was found six feet under by %2$s.
death.fell.assist.item: %1$s's destiny was found six feet under by %2$s using %3$s.
deathScreen.quit.confirm: but why? why would you do that?
deathScreen.spectate: look upon my works ye mighty and despair
deathScreen.title: how
